verbose_text: Briefly, hNPC derived neurons or mouse primary neurons were cultured with medium containing 5 mug/ml polybrene (Sigma, catalog # H9268) and 5 x 10 5 infectious units of lentiviruses containing the following : scrambled shRNA, TRIM9 specific shRNAs (target sequence for human : 5-CGATGCCCTCAACAGAAGAAA-3), pCDH lentivirus expressing mouse HA-TRIM9, or pCDH lentivirus expressing HA-SA mutant of TRIM9.
evidence: expressing mouse HA-TRIM9, or pCDH lentivirus
